title: Remodeled 2bd/1.5bth Townhouse-Open Sunday
posting_body: ['SHOWING: SUNDAY 8/7 FROM 12-12:30PM.', 'DO NOT RESPOND TO THIS ADVERTISEMENT.', 'VISIT WWW.SEKKINVESTMENTS.COM FOR MORE INFORMATION.', 'This large two bedroom, 1.5 bath townhouse has a fully updated kitchen with stainless steel appliances, laundry room, private garage with automatic garage door opener, and plenty of storage space throughout.', 'This unit features a walk-in closet in one bedroom and whole-wall closets in the other.', 'It has one full-bath upstairs and a half-bath downstairs, both of which are completely updated.', 'It also has energy efficient windows, fresh paint, new laminate wood flooring and a washer/dryer in the in-unit laundry room.', 'The unit comes with a second parking spot which fits another two vehicles.', 'Located at 22244 N 6th St in Castro Valley this townhouse is centrally located in Castro Valley at the intersection of Grove Way and North 6th Street.', 'Just seconds from I-580 or BART, your commute choices will never be easier!', "Starbucks, Trader Joe's, banking, and restaurants are all right around the corner!", 'We are a pet friendly community.', 'Cats and dogs (of all sizes) accepted!', 'SHOWING: SUNDAY 8/7 FROM 12-12:30PM.', 'DO NOT RESPOND TO THIS ADVERTISEMENT.', 'VISIT WWW.SEKKINVESTMENTS.COM FOR MORE INFORMATION.']
